title: Trump indictment live updates: Trump facing charges in classified docs investigation
description: Updates on former President Donald Trump's federal indictment in classified documents investigation.

title: 19 teens posing for photo injured after deck partially collapses at Texas park
description: More than a dozen teenagers from a church camp posing for a group photo were injured after a portion of a deck walkway collapsed at a seaside park in Texas.

title: Bank records raise questions about home remodel in Texas AG's impeachment
description: As embattled Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton fights a historic impeachment, his lawyers say they have evidence proving his innocence

title: Fugitive suspect in 1984 Florida killing arrested 39 years later in California
description: Authorities say a man wanted in the 1984 killing of a Florida woman has been arrested nearly four decades later

title: 5 flown to hospital after part of elevated walkway collapses in Texas beachside city
description: At least five people have been flown to be hospitalized after part of an elevated walkway collapsed in a beachside city in Texas

title: NY AG files lawsuit against anti-abortion group known for blocking access to clinics
description: New York’s attorney general has filed a federal lawsuit against an anti-abortion group whose members have been arrested for blocking access to health care clinics in New York and other states

title: Natalee Holloway suspect arrives in Alabama to face extortion, wire fraud charges
description: Joran van der Sloot, the main suspect in the unsolved 2005 disappearance of American teenager Natalee Holloway, has arrived in the United States.

title: 2 New Haven police officers fired for 2022 arrest that left Randy Cox paralyzed
description: Two New Haven police officers charged for their alleged involvement in the arrest of Randy Cox -- a Black man paralyzed while in police custody -- were fired Wednesday.

title: As tourists flock to view volcano's latest eruption, Hawaii urges mindfulness
description: Hawaii tourism officials are urging tourists to be respectful when flocking to a national park on the Big Island to get a glimpse of the latest eruption of Kilauea

title: Officers round up hundreds of pigs from overwhelmed Florida animal sanctuary
description: Officials say animal control officers rounded up more than 600 pigs from an animal sanctuary in Florida after their overwhelmed owner called for help

title: Prosecutor seeks death penalty against Kansas man accused of killing two sons
description: A prosecutor says he will seek the death penalty for a 43-year-old Kansas man accused of killing his two sons before fleeing to Oklahoma

title: Trial starts for man charged with killing Massachusetts officer
description: The prosecutor in the murder trial of a man charged with killing a Massachusetts police officer and an innocent bystander nearly five years ago told jurors in opening statements that the suspect acted with deliberation when he used the officer’s own gu...

title: Defense attorneys argue Trump deserves reconsideration of damages in Carroll case
description: Trump deserves a reconsideration of the damages a Manhattan jury awarded because it did not find Trump raped E. Jean Carroll, defense attorneys argued.

title: WATCH:  Hawaii's Kilauea volcano erupts after 3-month pause
description: Kilauea, one of the most active volcanoes in the world, began erupting Wednesday after a three-month pause on Hawaii's Big Island.

title: PM10 vs PM2.5: What to know about the particulate matter in the air
description: An air quality value over 300 is considered hazardous.

title: Young Americans brace for 'unprecedented' return of student loan payments
description: Student loans will be due for millions in August for the first time in years, due to the pandemic, despite a Supreme Court challenge to Biden's debt relief plan.

title: WATCH:  Toddler plays peek-a-boo with Winnie the Pooh
description: This mom captured her daughter's adorable peek-a-boo match with Winnie the Pooh during a recent visit to Walt Disney World Resort in Orlando, Florida.

title: Why Buffalo's lead pipe removal project will take decades to fix
description: Nearly 40,000 water service lines in Buffalo, over half of the 68,000 total water service lines in the city, are projected to contain lead.

title: Families of slain University of Idaho students honor their memories
description: Months after the killing of four University of Idaho students at their off-campus home, their families are turning the unthinkable into something positive.

title: GOP set to encourage early voting, mail balloting after years of opposite messaging
description: After years of criticizing mail voting and so-called ballot harvesting as ripe for fraud, Republicans at the top of the party want to change course

title: Supreme Court rules Alabama's congressional maps violate Voting Rights Act
description: Black voters had challenged the redrawing of the election maps.

title: WATCH:  Dog has an adorable birthday party guest
description: This dog's little cat buddy was in attendance when his humans sang him happy birthday.

title: Ex-boyfriend of missing Minnesota woman arrested after human remains found along road
description: A Minnesota man has been arrested in connection with the disappearance of his ex-girlfriend, after a deputy found human remains in a rural area

title: Ukraine begins counteroffensive against Russia, officials say
description: Ukrainian forces on Thursday began their long-awaited counteroffensive against invading Russian forces.

title: US applications for jobless benefits highest since October 2021
description: The number of Americans applying for unemployment benefits last week rose to its highest level since October 2021, but the labor market remains one of the healthiest parts of the U.S. economy

title: Pat Robertson, Christian evangelist and former presidential candidate, dead at 93
description: Pat Robertson, the Christian evangelist best known for his political commentary on "The 700 Club" and a former presidential candidate, has died. He was 93 years old.

title: VP Harris announces more than $100M to help Caribbean during visit to Bahamas
description: U.S. Vice President Kamala Harris has announced that the U.S. is investing more than $100 million in the Caribbean region to crack down on weapons trafficking, help alleviate Haiti’s humanitarian crisis and support climate change initiatives

title: 'No letters, no calls': Concern grows for families of Belarusian political prisoners
description: An increasing number of family and friends of Belarusian political prisoners say they are unable to contact their loved ones.

title: Former USC football player arrested after being accused of raping 2 women
description: A former USC college football player has been charged with raping two women in the past three years, according to the Los Angeles County District Attorney’s Office.

title: Bomb explodes in Afghanistan during a memorial ceremony for a Taliban official
description: A Taliban official says a bomb exploded in Afghanistan’s northeastern Badakhshan province during a memorial ceremony, killing several including a former Taliban police official

title: WATCH:  Lunar rainbows appear at Yosemite waterfall
description: A strawberry full moon created a magical scene of lunar rainbows forming in the waterfalls at Yosemite National Park, California.

title: Blinken announces $150M in aid for Syrians, Iraqis at Saudi meeting
description: Secretary of State Antony Blinken says the U.S. will provide nearly $150 million in aid for areas in Syria and Iraq that were liberated from the Islamic State extremist group

title: India not planning to invite Ukraine to G20 summit in September
description: India says it is not planning to invite Ukraine to the G20 summit of industrialized and developing nations in September

title: Russia says top UN court should dismiss Ukraine's case over Crimea, terrorism funding
description: Russia is urging judges at the United Nations’ highest court to throw out a case brought by Ukraine against Moscow focussed on the 2014 annexation of the Crimean Peninsula and the arming of rebels in eastern Ukraine in the years before Russia’s full-sc...

title: 8 injured in stabbing at playground in French Alps, suspect arrested
description: Eight people were stabbed in a playground in Annecy, France, local authorities said.

title: Malaysia, Singapore slam comedian for 'offensive' joke over MH370 plane disappearance
description: Malaysia has condemned a Singapore-born comedian who made fun of the 2014 disappearance of Malaysia Airlines Flight MH370 during a skit in the United States

title: 'Bob's Burgers' actor charged in Jan. 6: He had allegedly confronted Capitol police
description: Actor Jay Johnston has been charged in connection with the Jan. 6 riot at the U.S. Capitol

title: WATCH:  Would-be thief foiled by locked door at liquor store
description: This man's feeble attempt to take a crate of drinks was foiled by a locked door at a liquor store.

title: Biden vetoes bill to cancel student debt relief
description: President Joe Biden has vetoed legislation that would have canceled his plan to forgive student debt

title: FBI agents arrive in Peru for extradition of Joran van der Sloot to US: Sources
description: The FBI agents who will be escorting Joran van der Sloot back to the United States have arrived in Peru, sources told ABC News.

title: Grand jury indicts 2 Bureau of Prisons employees in inmate's death
description: A grand jury has indicted two federal Bureau of Prisons employees for allegedly failing to provide medical care for an inmate in Virginia who had a serious medical emergency and later died

title: New York City's 'smoke wave' response time for warnings criticized
description: As New York City was bombarded with dangerous air and smoke conditions, some environmental experts questioned if the city's leaders acted quickly enough to warn people.
